EmailTemplate.name: Response to Become a Member (No Space)
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for your interest in WeWork!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.Salutation_Name__c},
Thanks for getting in touch with us. We're excited for the opportunity to welcome you to the WeWork community.
While we do have waitlists for many of our spaces, if you'd like to book a tour directly, just click the link below, choose the city you'd like and select the most convenient time for you. Otherwise, we'll call you back as soon as we can.
https://www.wework.com/locations?lid={!Lead.Id}&utm_source=email&utm_medium=become_a_member_email&utm_campaign=become_a_member&utm_content=book_a_tour_and_commons
If you'd like to join the community right away, you could take a look at our WeWork Commons plans. With WeWork Commons, you'll gain immediate access to our member network, our events and our benefits and you'll be able to book space on demand at many of our buildings. You can find out more by following the link below.
https://signup.wework.com/?utm_source=email&utm_medium=become_a_member&utm_campaign=become_a_member&utm_content=book_a_tour_and_commons
Have questions? Just reply to this email or write to us at joinus@wework.com.
Best, WeWork | {!User.Name} +1.855.593.9675 wework.com
